Text: A good pair of kitchen scissors.

jonny , need your help 
i took a hd film of yours but i cannot put on a dvd dl they said is to large(just 4.2 mb over..)
Can you tell me what sould i do ? becouse i hared that i could edit the vid cutting just 4 mb of it  but i dont know how..
@Mocanu :  Change the dvd burner with Ashampoo Burning Studio v. 9.0 or 10 [lead-in and lead-out...shorter] and your movie[max 4,37Gb] will fit. Forget about Nero... Good Luck my friend !!

@Mocanu: I read again your post and you talk about a dual layer DVD[DVD9]...You may try the same...[close to 8gb/disc...single sided]....These BluRayrips in mkv container are made to fit [almost all of them ] on  a single disc...Change the soft for dvd burning...Ashampoo...

Thank you so much for this awesome rip! I played this file with VLC, English subs were embedded (you can turn them off or on, whatever you please).
